title: Star Wars Resistance Trailer Debuts
body:
The first trailer for ‘Star Wars: Resistance’ has debuted.  The show, which is set to premiere on The Disney Channel October 7th, marks a change in animation style from that of the two previous series (’Star Wars: Rebels’ and ‘Star Wars: Clone Wars’).  Disney also released a synopsis of the premiere episode:

Poe and BB-8 assign newly-appointed spy Kaz to the Colossus, a massive aircraft re-fueling platform on an outer rim water planet, home to colorful new aliens, droids and creatures. While undercover, Kaz works as a mechanic and lives with Poe’s old friend Yeager, a veteran pilot who operates a starship repair shop run by his crew: Tam, Neeku and their old battered astromech droid, Bucket. Kaz soon finds himself in over his head with his new friend BB-8 as he’ll have to compete in dangerous sky races, keep his mission a secret from his newfound family, and avoid the danger of the First Order.

title: Blast Panel Battle Game
body:
Blast Panel Battle Game

I bought this Blast Panel Battle game from a local toy store. It looks like its a variation on the classic Jenga family game, but in a Star Wars style.

The game board is a vertical Millennium Falcon with hexagonal deflector shield pieces.

Two players each have a Star Destroyer hammer and take turns tapping out pieces of the shield and who ever knocks out the generator is the loser. Simple and I…

title: Art & Preservation in Star Wars
body:
New episode: Art & Preservation in Star Wars

Art history and historic preservation are the topics of this long-awaited episode of Skytalkers. In an episode guided by Caitlin’s Masters, in part one, we discuss “the Lost 20” from Attack of the Clones, monuments, the Jedi, and remembrance. In part two, we talk about Sabine and Thrawn, and how art and art history define them as heroes and villains. In part three, Caitlin talks about film as a…

summary: A lot of stuff I read/watch about The Last Jedi mentions those little kids in the context of -- like, what's going to happen to...
body: A lot of stuff I read/watch about The Last Jedi mentions those little kids in the context of – like, what’s going to happen to them?  People seem to assume we’re going to see them again but I didn’t think they were being introduced to them as actual characters.  I thought that the kids exist to (rather brusquely) tell the audience how we’re supposed to feel about the heros.

summary: hades and persephone au for kylo x reader?? i love your blog!!!! ❤️❤️
question: hades and persephone au for kylo x reader?? i love your blog!!!! ❤️❤️
answer:
─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

Hey hun!!! first of all thank you for the compliment and the ask xx I honestly LOVE THIS PROMPT and had so many ideas when I first read it, so hopefully I did it justice for you. Although I did get a bit carried away with the mythology and I’m afraid it’s too much of an AU, whoops.

(Click here if you want to ask me something or if you want to request something! Click here if you want to read more of my writing! Here’s the link to my ko-fi if you want to buy me a much needed coffee! Have a good day xx)

NSFW WARNING: if kissing counts as nsfw lmao. didn’t feel like this could get more smutty without it feeling unnatural. didn’t even tag it thats how tame it is.

WORD COUNT: 1533

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

DYING BY THE HAND OF A FOREIGN MAN: Kylo Ren x Reader (Hades and Persephone AU)

You hate how cold it is down here.

That’s the worst part. The lack of warmth; no matter where you search, no matter how long, you cannot find it. Sometimes you forget what it feels like.

It makes you sad.

This whole place makes you sad.

It is unforgiving and dark.

He is unforgiving and dark.

You avoid him as much as you can, looking at him only makes you ache. You ache to again see Zephyrus and feel his warm breeze dance through your hair, to greet Apollo as the sun rises each morning, and to see you mother, Demeter, and wander through her harvests. Instead you must wander through this wasteland, watching souls suffer in eternal agony in the Asphodel Meadows.

Sometimes, you mourn for them. Other times, you mourn for yourself.

He loves you. That’s what he tells you at least.

You’re not sure you believe him, because how could he? How could he when he keeps you down here, when he denies the sun and the breeze and the harvest from you. How could he.

You’re not sure how long its been, how many tears you have cried, how long you have sat in silence, but eventually Zeus arrives. Steely, intimidating, lightning crackling in the throne room and he orders him to let you return to the world above. He says it is too late. You have eaten six pomegranate seeds, so now you have to spend six months a year in the Underworld. Those are the rules. Zeus accepts this and leaves. It smells like ozone for a brief moment and you wish you were anywhere but here.

You want to yell at him. Ask him why he didn’t tell you about the pomegranates, why he let you doom yourself, why he did this to you. But you can’t. Instead you peer into the sea of damned souls and feel like you’re one of them.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

Soon enough, spring comes and you are allowed out. You dress in your prettiest dress; all white lace and colourful embroidered flowers. You long for the moment it dances in the wind, for the moment the sun warms your skin, the moment you see your mothers face again.

He stops you before you go. His cold hand on your arm.

“Please come back”, he says, his eyes sad. The shadows cast on his face make it look like he is in mourning. His eyes are wet.

“Why?”, you ask, already knowing the answer.

His eyes lock with yours, “You know why.”

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

In the last week you and your mother have together she suggests that you don’t go back. Zeus will surely allow it, she says, Gods do this sort of thing all the time. She tells you over and over that you can stay, and you dont have to go back there.

You tell her you will think about it.

Two days before fall begins you tell your mother that you cannot stay. You swallowed six pomegranate seeds and those are the rules. She cries.

What you cant tell her is that all you been able to think about for the past six months is him. His hand, cold on your arm. His eyes, wet with tears because you’re leaving him. His lips, which you remember looking so soft. His body, so tall, so strong, but so beautiful.

You want to go back. You realise. You want to see him.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

The last thing you see before you return the the Underworld is your mother crying. Suddenly, you are angry, angry that she dares to cry when you’ll be back in six months. Suddenly, spending six months away from her seems much more appealing than it did before.

He is waiting for you. His three headed dog, Cerberus, by his side. Cerberus bounds towards you first, whining, panting and barking. You bend down to pet him. You smile as one of Cerberus’ heads nuzzles against your hand. You are happy.

“I’m glad you came back”, he says.

You stop petting Cerberus and glance up at him, “I’m glad I did too.”

You think he almost smiles.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

Two months pass, and you think you are used to the cold now. It doesn’t bother you like it used to and you can finally wear your pretty dresses again. You scour the gardens and braid black dahlias and black widows into your hair. You snack on the pomegranates, making sure to take out the seeds. You walk the banks of the river Styx, staring into it’s depths. You find Elysium and the Isle of the Blessed. You fill your days with the words of the heroes and scholars who spend their eternities there.

You no longer cry.

You begin to enjoy it. He is still distant and cold, but you find that you do not need him to like you for you to be happy here.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

He is not cruel. You realise this quickly.

He is just scared.

That’s what you think at least.

You think he was scared that no one would love him. You think he took you because he thought you would, eventually, learn to love him. In his head that seemed better than no one loving him for all eternity.

You think you understand that.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

You dont love him.

(You dont!)

But you think you desire him. He looks at you with his dark eyes, brooding and hooded, and it makes your knees weak. Sometimes you stare at his fingers for too long and wonder what he can do with them. The same with his lips. You wonder what it would be like to kiss them, would he be soft and gentle or insistent and rough.

Sometimes you stare too long and you think he knows.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

He knows.

He finds you in the garden one night and confronts you.

“What do you want?”, you ask, as he stands there looking over you as you braid a flower crown of black dahlias.

You look up and he’s smirking. Smirking. You falter for a moment, because you’ve never seen him smirk before and fuck it’s hot.

“You’ve been staring”, his voice is low and tilted with amusement and lust.

“Have I?”, you ask coyly, looking back down at your flower crown.

“Yes.”

“I don’t think you know what you’re talking about”, you place the flower crown gently down on the bench for later and stand up to look him in the eyes.

“I think I do.”

You hum slightly and leave him standing there.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

“Admit it.”

“Admit what?”, you refuse to look at him.

“You want me.”

Oh. A jolt of electricity runs through you. You didn’t think that that would affect you as much as it did. You cant stop thinking about him now. His lips, his hair, his hands, even his ass.

“I- I do not.”

He laughs. For the first time you think. It’s throaty and harsh, like he doesn’t do it often.

“You do”, he says.

Fuck it then.

You turn around. He’s right behind you, which you really didn’t expect. You put your hands on his shoulders and you kiss him.

It’s soft. So soft. His lips are plump and insistent against yours almost immediately. His hands move from being useless at his sides, to pressing his whole palms splayed on back and pulling you toward him. One of your hands tangles into his hair, scraping your nails against his scalp. His tongue slips into your mouth and it turns almost frantic, hands grabbing for purchase, pulling each other closer, not even stopping for air. Then he does something with his tongue, and you moan.

You freeze after that. You can feel yourself going red and you try to pull away from him. Instead he just laughs and pulls you back gently every time you try to move.

“Stop laughing”, you mumble, your face pressed into his firm chest.

He smiles and kisses the top of your head.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

“I’m sorry you know”, he tells you as you lay in bed together.

The silk sheets are soft against you and his hand rests gently against your hip.

“For what?”, you ask.

He pulls you closer to him. You nestle into his body, his arm holding you against him. His mouth rests just under your ear, lips soft on your neck.

“Bringing you here. I know you didn’t want it.”

You think for a moment.

“I’m glad you did”, you say eventually, and you are.

He sighs, “I love you.”

…

“I love you too.”

Briefly, you wonder is this was Aphrodite’s doing, or if it was fate… You think it may be both.

You think he was scared that no one would love him. You think he took you because he thought you would, eventually, learn to love him. In his head that seemed better than no one loving him for all eternity.

You think you understand that.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

You dont love him.

(You dont!)

But you think you desire him. He looks at you with his dark eyes, brooding and hooded, and it makes your knees weak. Sometimes you stare at his fingers for too long and wonder what he can do with them. The same with his lips. You wonder what it would be like to kiss them, would he be soft and gentle or insistent and rough.

Sometimes you stare too long and you think he knows.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

He knows.

He finds you in the garden one night and confronts you.

“What do you want?”, you ask, as he stands there looking over you as you braid a flower crown of black dahlias.

You look up and he’s smirking. Smirking. You falter for a moment, because you’ve never seen him smirk before and fuck it’s hot.

“You’ve been staring”, his voice is low and tilted with amusement and lust.

“Have I?”, you ask coyly, looking back down at your flower crown.

“Yes.”

“I don’t think you know what you’re talking about”, you place the flower crown gently down on the bench for later and stand up to look him in the eyes.

“I think I do.”

You hum slightly and leave him standing there.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

“Admit it.”

“Admit what?”, you refuse to look at him.

“You want me.”

Oh. A jolt of electricity runs through you. You didn’t think that that would affect you as much as it did. You cant stop thinking about him now. His lips, his hair, his hands, even his ass.

“I- I do not.”

He laughs. For the first time you think. It’s throaty and harsh, like he doesn’t do it often.

“You do”, he says.

Fuck it then.

You turn around. He’s right behind you, which you really didn’t expect. You put your hands on his shoulders and you kiss him.

It’s soft. So soft. His lips are plump and insistent against yours almost immediately. His hands move from being useless at his sides, to pressing his whole palms splayed on back and pulling you toward him. One of your hands tangles into his hair, scraping your nails against his scalp. His tongue slips into your mouth and it turns almost frantic, hands grabbing for purchase, pulling each other closer, not even stopping for air. Then he does something with his tongue, and you moan.

You freeze after that. You can feel yourself going red and you try to pull away from him. Instead he just laughs and pulls you back gently every time you try to move.

“Stop laughing”, you mumble, your face pressed into his firm chest.

He smiles and kisses the top of your head.

─── ･ ｡ﾟ☆: *.☽ .* :☆ﾟ. ───

“I’m sorry you know”, he tells you as you lay in bed together.

The silk sheets are soft against you and his hand rests gently against your hip.

“For what?”, you ask.

He pulls you closer to him. You nestle into his body, his arm holding you against him. His mouth rests just under your ear, lips soft on your neck.

“Bringing you here. I know you didn’t want it.”

You think for a moment.

“I’m glad you did”, you say eventually, and you are.

He sighs, “I love you.”

…

“I love you too.”

Briefly, you wonder is this was Aphrodite’s doing, or if it was fate… You think it may be both.

by Avdal

“Lay down on your bed.”

Miss Rey stand up and opens the snap on her clutch purse. He stares at her blankly and she smiles back. Does he have a dumb expression on his face? Because it feels like he has a dumb expression on his face.

When he lays down, Miss Rey moves to stand next to him. She draws out a long and thin banner of fabric. It shines in the soft lighting with a pleasing gleam.

“Is that a- a blindfold?” he asks nervously.
